name: Ball Runners 1 [Early Access]
description:
Welcome to Ball Runners I (1), in this game you are a ball, and you are jumping parkour (basicly platformer). This game is still in early access, many things will change, and ofcourse there will be alot more levels. I will try to make as much levels as possible. I have tons of plans on the game, so you can enjoy it.

Early Access Log (0.1.0 Alpha):

-Game (obvioustly)
-Multicolored Player
-Few Levels
-Jumps
-Other (Walls and stuff that does not matter to put here.)

Updates soon. 

The .rar file contains:

README.txt
Ball Runners I [64-bit]
Ball Runners I [32-bit]

More updates in near future.
